missing.game.items.movable

Class Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • missing.game.items.Item
      • missing.game.items.movable.Movable
        • missing.game.items.movable.Resource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, WorldTile.TileObject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Dirt, Stone, Wood

    public abstract class Resource
extends Movable
    This class represents a Movable item that can be used to create Craftable items

        public Resource(java.lang.String name,
                java.lang.String description,
                java.awt.Point worldLocation,

        Construct a new Instance of a Resource.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the item
        description - describes what the item is
        worldLocation - the section of the world this item is located in
        tileLocation - the tile in the worldLocation in which the item is located
        size - represents size of item
        amount - amount of Resource items
